Function reference

All functions

alcohol()
(Internal) Find crashes involving alcohol
bicyclist()
(Internal) Find crashes involving bicyclists
counts()
Generate counts
distracted_driver()
(Internal) Find crashes involving distracted drivers
download_fars()
(Internal) Download FARS data files
drowsy_driver()
(Internal) Find crashes involving drowsy drivers
drugs()
(Internal) Find crashes involving drugs
fars_data_changes
Changes in FARS Data Elements by Data File and Year
fars_data_structure
FARS data structure
fars_varnames
FARS Variable Names
geo_relations
Synonym table for various geographical scales
get_fars()
Get FARS data
large_trucks()
(Internal) Find crashes involving large trucks
motorcycle()
(Internal) Find crashes involving motorcycles
older_driver()
(Internal) Find crashes involving older drivers
pedalcyclist()
(Internal) Find crashes involving pedalcyclists
pedbike()
(Internal) Find crashes involving pedstrians or bicyclists
pedestrian()
(Internal) Find crashes involving pedestrians
police_pursuit()
(Internal) Find crashes involving police pursuits
prep_fars_2015()
Handle yyyy data preparation

Handle yyyy data preparation
prep_fars_2018()
Handle yyyy data preparation
prep_fars_2019()
Handle yyyy data preparation
prep_fars_2020()
Handle yyyy data preparation
read_basic_csv()
(Internal) Takes care of basic CSV reading
speeding()
(Internal) Find crashes involving speeding
usenames()
(Internal) Use decoded variables instead of encoded ones
use_fars()
(Internal) Use FARS data files
validate_states()
(Internal) Validate user-provided list of states
validate_years()
(Internal) Validate user-provided list of states
young_driver()
(Internal) Find crashes involving young drivers
